title: Price ceiling above equilibrium has no impact

content.prompt: In the rental housing market, what would be the effect of a rent control that was set at the market equilibrium rental price?

choices.label: It would increase the number of housing units available, creating a surplus.
It would decrease the number of housing units available, creating a shortage.
It would have no impact on the number of housing units available.
It would increase the consumer surplus and decrease the producer surplus.
It would decrease the consumer surplus and increase the producer surplus.

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
